720576f-a.folder: Hudson Street & Perry Street, Manhattan, NY
720576f-a.text:
541-549, and 551-553 Hudson Street, west side, at and north
across Perry Street.
March 29, 1933.
P. L. Sperr.
Meg th g4

720577f-a.folder: Hudson Street & Perry Street, Manhattan, NY
720577f-a.text:
549 and 547 Hudson Street, at and adjoining the S.W. corner of Perry Street (right).  Also shown is the south side of Perry Street, West from Hudson and across Greenwich (Ninth Ave. Elevated Line thereon) Streets.

August 3, 1937

P. L. Sperr.

722553f-a.folder: Perry Street & Hudson Street, Manhattan, NY
722553f-a.text:
Perry Street, east from Hudson Street and showing respectively at the N.W. and N.E. corners of Bleecker Street, two white buildings; Nos. 91 (also 386 Bleecker Street) and 87 (also 385 Bleecker Street).
August 3, 1937.
P. L. Sperr.

722554f-a.folder: Perry Street & Hudson Street, Manhattan, NY
722554f-a.text:
(1)
Perry Street, west from No. 99 (right) a point east of Hudson, across same to West Streets and showing the Ninth Ave. Elevated Line
on Greenwich Street.
August 3, 1937.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
A similar view slightly westward.
August 3, 1937.
P. L. Sperr.
(3)
Another view photographed from a point midway between Greenwich and Washington Streets. The elevated structure shown is that of New York Central Railroad which runs on Washington Street. The 5-story tenements appearing on the left are Nos. 135 and 137.
August 3, 1937.
P. L. Sperr.

November 30, 1933.
. 4

i.

November 30, 1933.
P. L. Sperr.
